mapper.select: select me.* ,s.name as shopName,concat(u.firstName,u.lastName) as userName,concat(u2.firstName,u2.lastName) as waiterName from menu_evaluate me join shop_info s on me.sid=s.sid join user_info u on me.uid=u.uid join user_info u2 on me.wid=u2.uid where me.mid=#{mid} order by me.createDate desc
